title: Ascendance Prime Gaming (APG) brand new team!
body:
We are looking to fill our roster.

Depending on interest there will be trials which will be held on Friday 15/01/16 9.00pm (NZST) 7.00pm (AEDT)

You will be expected to be available twice a week for scrims/practice

All games will be recorded for quality purposes, some games will be streamed on twitch via the team's channel.

To register please copy paste and fill out below

Skype and/or teamspeak 3 is a must.

IGN:
Preffered Role:
Champ Pool for role:
2nd Prefference:
Champ Pool for 2nd Pref:
Years experience playing league:
Age:
Current Solo Q Rank:

Please note I will be analyzing all applicants using lol.arenaonline.com, oce.op.gg and lolskill.net.

If your application is successful you will receive an ingame friends request before 6.30pm (NZST) Friday 15th/01/16

replies.body:

Age: 28

Prefered Role: Jungle
Champ Pool for role: Jax, Fizz, Malphite, Master Yi, Volibear (just naming a few (had really good success with fizz jg lately))
2nd Preference: Mid
Champ Pool for 2nd Pref: Zed, Annie, Fizz (prefer zed as he's my main mid/top laner)
Years experience playing league: Since late season 2
Age: 17
Current Solo Q Rank: Gold 4, but i havent played since winning my 10 promotion games. 

I have skype, ts3 and curse voice and discord.

IGN: Nezu

Preffered Role: ADC

Champ Pool for role: Lucian (Main champ, can compete in master-tier games with him)/Vayne/Tristana/Caitlin/Kalista/Draven/Ezreal
2nd Prefference: Jungle

Champ Pool for 2nd Pref: Rengar (Main champ, again can compete in master-tier games with him)/Rek'sai/Elise/Lee Sin/Nidalee

Years experience playing league: Playing since Season 3, roughly 2.5-3 years experience.

Age: 18

Current Solo Q Rank: Platinum 5, although have stopped playing as seriously in Solo Q since pre-season.

Hope to hear from you guys! Have Skype/Ts3/Discord/Curse.

Hey guys,

It would be cool to let us know about the average rank of your actual members, to get an feel of what we could bring to your team.

_**Here are my info :**_

IGN: Katalize

Preffered Role: Mid laner

Champ Pool for role:
Currently playing a lot : Brand / Veigar / Kayle / Cassio / Velkoz
Highly skilled on : Elise / Fizz / TF / katarina / LB / Zed


2nd Prefference: Support
Champ Pool for 2nd Pref: Morgana / Sona / Soraka / Thresh / Brand / LB
I need to expand the champion pool on this account, Leona was a pick i played a lot on NA

Years experience playing league: 5 years
Age: 25
Current Solo Q Rank: Gold 3

**_Additional info :_**

What do you want from a team:
I value team spirit, working on our mutual flaws together.
I expect my team members to be open to criticism as much as I am.
I am not a leader type, yet I expect to be able to give advice and strategic opinions, while being heard out.
I am looking to learn from other experienced and motivated players.

Rank 5s Experience:
I have played in a 5 teams in season 3, Australian player base on NA server. I was the mid laner and our compositions relied on CC / AOE such as Galio / Cho gath / Kennen / Vlad mid picks.
I haven't played in 5's ranked since then, mainly in 3s on Twisted treeline and solo/ duo queue on SR.

Hope to hear from you,
Cheers,
